languages.text: "Эльсинора, моя жена. Погибла, устраняя аварию в крюйт-камере, еще при Леди Теодоре". {n}Дым от папиросы заботливо заслоняет Энриха, пряча эмоции на его лице.{/n}
"Elsinora, my wife. She died saving the ammo depot, back in Lady Theodora's time." {n}The smoke from the lho-stick mercifully obscures Einrich, hiding the traces of emotion on his face.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Эльсинора, моя жена. Погибла, устраняя аварию в крюйт-камере, еще при Леди Теодоре". {n}Дым от папиросы заботливо заслоняет Энриха, пряча эмоции на его лице.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Elsinora, my wife. Died fixing an accident in the ammo room, back in Lady Theodora's time.". {n}The smoke from the lho stick caringly obscures Einrich, hiding the traces of emotion on his face.{/n}
"Elsinora, my wife. Died fixing an accident in the ammo room, back in Lady Theodora's time.". {n}The smoke from the lho stick caringly obscures Einrich, hiding the traces of emotion on his face.{/n}

"Elsinora, my wife. She died fixing a blunder in the ammo room, back in Lady Theodora's time." {n}The smoke from the lho stick mercifully obscures Einrich, hiding the traces of emotion on his face.{/n}

"Elsinora, my wife. She died saving the ammo depot, back in Lady Theodora's time." {n}The smoke from the lho-stick mercifully obscures Einrich, hiding the traces of emotion on his face.{/n}

languages.text: "Elsinora, meine Frau. Sie starb bei der Sicherung des Munitionsdepots, damals, zu Lady Theodoras Zeit." {n}Der Rauch des Lho-Stabs hüllt Einrich ein und verbirgt die Gefühlsregungen in seinem Gesicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Elsinora, my wife. She died saving the ammo depot, back in Lady Theodora's time." {n}The smoke from the lho-stick mercifully obscures Einrich, hiding the traces of emotion on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Elsinora, meine Frau. Sie starb bei der Sicherung des Munitionsdepots, damals, zu Lady Theodoras Zeit. {n}Der Rauch des Lho-Stabs hüllt Einrich ein und verbirgt die Gefühlsregungen in seinem Gesicht.{/n}

languages.text: « Elsinora, mon épouse. Elle est morte en sauvant le dépôt de munitions, du temps de dame Théodora. » {n}La fumée de cigalho vient au secours d'Einrich, voilant momentanément le chagrin qui assombrit son visage.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Elsinora, my wife. She died saving the ammo depot, back in Lady Theodora's time." {n}The smoke from the lho-stick mercifully obscures Einrich, hiding the traces of emotion on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Elsinora, mon épouse. Elle est morte en sauvant le dépôt de munitions, du temps de dame Théodora. » {n}La fumée de cigalho vient au secours d'Einrich, voilant momentanément le chagrin qui assombrit son visage.{/n}

languages.text: «Elsinora, mi esposa. Murió salvando el polvorín en tiempos de lady Theodora». {n}El humo del cigarrillo de lho oscurece las facciones de Einrich, ocultando todo indicio de emoción en ellas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Elsinora, my wife. She died saving the ammo depot, back in Lady Theodora's time." {n}The smoke from the lho-stick mercifully obscures Einrich, hiding the traces of emotion on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Elsinora, mi esposa. Murió salvando el polvorín en tiempos de lady Theodora». {n}El humo del cigarrillo de lho oscurece las facciones de Einrich, ocultando todo indicio de emoción en ellas.{/n}

languages.text: 「私の妻、エルシノーラは。シオドーラ様の時代に、弾薬庫を守って死亡しました」{n}ルホスティックからの煙が慈悲深くもアインリッヒを包み込み、その顔に浮かぶ感情の痕跡を隠す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Elsinora, my wife. She died saving the ammo depot, back in Lady Theodora's time." {n}The smoke from the lho-stick mercifully obscures Einrich, hiding the traces of emotion on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私の妻、エルシノーラは。シオドーラ様の時代に、弾薬庫を守って死亡しました」{n}アイホスティックからの煙が慈悲深くもアインリッヒを包み込み、その顔に浮かぶ感情の痕跡を隠す。{/n}

languages.text: “埃尔茜诺拉，我的妻子。在西奥多拉夫人的时代，她为了拯救弹药库而牺牲了自己。”{n}麻烟烟杆上冒出的青烟仁慈地遮住了艾因里奇的脸，掩盖了他情感的痕迹。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Elsinora, my wife. She died saving the ammo depot, back in Lady Theodora's time." {n}The smoke from the lho-stick mercifully obscures Einrich, hiding the traces of emotion on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “埃尔茜诺拉，我的妻子。在西奥多拉夫人的时代，她为了拯救弹药库而牺牲了自己。”{n}麻烟烟杆上冒出的青烟仁慈地遮住了艾因里奇的脸，掩盖了他情感的痕迹。{/n}

languages.text: "Elsinora. Eşim. Leydi Theodora zamanında cephaneliği kurtarırken ölmüştü." {n}Liho dalının dumanı, Einrich'e merhamet edip yüzündeki duygu izlerini gizliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Elsinora, my wife. She died saving the ammo depot, back in Lady Theodora's time." {n}The smoke from the lho-stick mercifully obscures Einrich, hiding the traces of emotion on his face.{/n}
